title: Breville -- Tips and Tricks: Variable Temperature Tea Kettle BKE820XL

asset.author: breville

transcripts: Tea lovers Rejoice. Introducing the Breville variable temperature tea kettle. Once your palate is accustomed to tea made the right way using this kettle, linger back to the mediocre brew. There are a lot of intricacies about learning to make the perfect cup of tea the aroma body and overall character will alter depending on your preset selected an appropriate steep. 175 degrees for green tea ,185 for white tea, 195 for oolong, 200 degrees for French press, and to 210 degrees for black tea or to bring your water for a full boil. And with the clever hold temp feature, the kettle will keep the water at that temperature ready for you to pull your second cup saving you both time and energy. Electric tea kettles are useful for hot chocolate, oatmeal, instant soups and noodles, and with the auto shut-off feature this cattle will become part of the daily routine. The variable temperature tea kettle another great Innovation by Breville
